nodes.text: Manufactured by Sienar Fleet Systems, Obsidian 8 was a modified TIE/LN starfighter serving the Galactic Empire's Obsidian Squadron by the year 3 ABY. Obsidian 8 was operated by a TIE pilot who was previously stationed aboard the Star Destroyer Devastator. Obsidian 8 was used most often to pursue raiders attempting to take refuge in the upper atmosphere of nearby planets.

In 3 ABY, the Empire occupied the planet Bespin with the goal of capturing the YT-1300 light freighter Millennium Falcon. When the Falcon escaped from Bespin's Cloud City, Obsidian Squadron pursued the freighter into space. However, Obsidian Squadron was unsuccessful in their pursuit, and the Millennium Falcon successfully evaded Imperial capture.
Obsidian 8 was created for Decipher, Inc.'s 1997 Cloud City Limited expansion set of the Star Wars Customizable Card Game.
